articles.description: Prosecutors in Paris say the player was indicted by a judge and placed under judicial supervision.
articles.content:
Morocco and Paris Saint-Germain defender Achraf Hakimi has been charged with rape, French prosecutors have said.
The prosecutors office in the Paris suburb of Nanterre said Hakimi was questioned on … [+1864 chars]
